document_data.mainbody:
ER had golden-brown skin. Her hair was black, and her eyes were brown.{{Cite adventurers league/Parnast Under Siege|8}} 
SEER wore blue robes{{Cite adventurers league/Durlag's Tower|6-8}}
document_data.Description:
SEER had golden-brown skin. Her hair was black, and her eyes were brown.{{Cite adventurers league/Parnast Under Siege|8}} 
SEER wore blue robes{{Cite adventurers league/Durlag's Tower|6-8}}
document_data.Personality: SEER had an elderly, maternal personality{{Cite adventurers league/Forgotten Traditions|22}}

Relationships.Hsing: [[Hsing]] was SEER's [[pseudodragon]] [[familiar]], whom she often sent on missions for her.{{Cite adventurers league/The Black Road|4}} He called her his 'Mistress'{{Cite adventurers league/Reeducation|6}} and he could often be found resting on her shoulders. She could communicate [[telepathy|telepathically]] with him.
Relationships.Bitter-root: Once adventuring companions, after SEER left [[Bitter-root]] at Durlag's Tower, she came to resent SEER for not rescuing her.{{Cite adventurers league/Durlag's Tower|13}} In truth, SEER did care about her friend.{{Cite adventurers league/Durlag's Tower|14}}
Relationships.Baron Rajiram: Baron [[Rajiram]] was a foe of SEER, and they had encountered each other in the past. Decades after that encounter, he offered a reward of 3,000 [[gold pieces]] to the assassins [[Bahldrak Slagspit|Bahldrak]] and [[Bellegia Slagspit]] if they killed any of her agents.
Relationships.Order of the Gauntlet: SEER was known to work with the [[Order of the Gauntlet]]{{Cite adventurers league/Durlag's Tower|5}} and had contact with [[Zern Xerkstil]].{{Cite adventurers league/In Dire Need|7-8}}
